item.title: Hugo Easy Gallery Shortcode
item.author: aben20807@gmail.com (Huang, Po-Hsuan 黃柏瑄 (aben20807))
item.description: The existing work force the users using the image folder in the site or shortcodes to add the link to the image while I just want to use the markdown language to add images. Therefore, I write this post and create a demo site to show how I make it work.
